name: countryinfo
0:
”Alexa, ask country info for capital of india”
”Alexa, ask country info for language of Romania”
”Alexa, ask country info for currency of Germany”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: country info
des: Gives the country info. In the days of globalisation, everyone needs to have basic information about the capitals, currencies and languages spoken in different countries at their fingertips. This functionality is provided by the skill set. Now, you will be able to ask about a country and get main info about it.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
